synthesis_conditions.label: framework_components
synthesis_conditions.details: Imidazolium groups along the pore channels and the pyrazolate metal binding site

synthesis_conditions.label: metal_node
synthesis_conditions.details: Cobalt ion with a tetrahedral geometry connected by four different pyrazolate units

synthesis_conditions.label: IAST_selectivity_values_for_binary_gas_mixtures
synthesis_conditions.details: C2H2 over CO2 and C2H4 (50:50 v/v) are 13.7 and 13.2, respectively, at 298 K and 100 kPa

synthesis_conditions.label: isosteric_heats_of_adsorption
synthesis_conditions.details: C2H2: 36.9 kJ mol@1, C2H4: 34.2 kJ mol@1, CO2: 33.4 kJ mol@1

synthesis_conditions.label: water_stability_test
synthesis_conditions.details: Soaked in water for 2 months with no change in PXRD patterns

synthesis_conditions.label: dynamic_separation_conditions
synthesis_conditions.details: Equimolar gas mixtures passed over a tubular column packed with activated JCM-1 solid at a flow rate of 7 mL min@1 at 298 K

synthesis_conditions.label: recyclability_test_conditions
synthesis_conditions.details: Cycling breakthrough experiments with an equimolar mixture of C2H2/CO2 at 298 K and 1 bar
